title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.3 - Holiday, definition of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1244.3 - Holiday, definition of

State Regulations

New Year's Day, Lincoln's Birthday, Washington's

Birthday, Good Friday, Memorial Day, Independence Day, Labor Day, Columbus Day, Election Day, Veterans' Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day, or any day
observed in lieu thereof. Notes

1244.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
